title: Important Information Regarding the Washington CARES Fund
summary: The newsletter discusses updates related to the Washington CARES Fund, including guidance for employers on collecting premiums and maintaining privacy protections under RCW 42.56.230(3). It also explores the legal implications of maintaining files for public employees, referencing case law from Baxter v. Western Washington University.
compressed_content: Quinn and Quinn, P.S. is the legal counsel for more than 40 fire departments in Washington State. Office located at 7403 Lakewood Drive West, Suite #11, Lakewood, WA 98499-7951. Mailing address: 20 Forest Glen Lane SW, Lakewood, WA 98498. Contact information: Eric Quin at ericquinn@firehouselawyer.com. Access the newsletter at firehouselawyer.com. Topics covered include: Important Information Regarding the Washington CARES Fund and When is an Employee’s Private Information Exempt from Public Disclosure. Stay updated on legal developments affecting public agencies.
